name: FatHouse Almond Milk Soap Little Black Dress
description:
Little Black Dress
 
A one of a kind fragrance. Base notes of white carnation and blood orange are the perfect foil for heart notes of sandalwood, black rose, smoky wood, and a kiss of patchouli. The top notes give a hint of toasted vanilla bean and whiffs of vetiver, amber, and the tiniest touch of Egyptian musk for a wonderful finish.  Almond Milk is added during the soap making process to give the soap a creamy, rich lather.

Ingredients: Water, saponifed olive oil, coconut oil, Shea butter, palm kernel oil, castor oil, almond milk and fragrance oil

Saponification is a process that produces soap from fats and lye.

Each bar is hand cut and weighs approximately 5oz.

We use only the finest ingredients to create the best soaps!

Each batch is created using the cold process soap making method.

Each soap batch is tested and to ensure mildness.

name: FatHouse Almond Milk Soap Barber Shop
description:
The fragrance of this soap has that shave and a haircut, barbershop smell. With notes of rum and a light top note of musk and bay, this scent is all about that classic masculine smell. Almond Milk is added during the soap making process to give the soap a creamy, rich lather. 

Ingredients: Water, saponifed olive oil, coconut oil, Shea butter, palm kernel oil, castor oil, almond milk and fragrance oil

Saponification is a process that produces soap from fats and lye.

Each bar is hand cut and weighs approximately 5oz.

We use only the finest ingredients to create the best soaps!

Each batch is created using the cold process soap making method.

Each soap batch is  tested and  to ensure mildness.

name: FatHouse Shaving Soap Unscented
description:
FatHouse Shaving Soap is an excellent alternative to normal shaving creams and gels. FatHouse Shaving Soap is 100% natural. Our shaving soap recipe uses olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil and sweet almond oil to create a lather perfect for shaving. Bentonite clay is add to the soap to create "slip" for the ultimate shave. FatHouse Shaving Soap is unscented, perfect for sensitive skin.

Ingredients: water, saponifed olive oil, coconut oil, castor oil, sweet almond oil and bentonite clay.

Saponification is a process that produces soap from fats and lye.

Each bar is hand cut and weighs approximately 5oz.

We use only the finest ingredients to create the best soaps!

Each batch is created using the cold process soap making method.

Each soap batch is PH tested and cured for four weeks to ensure mildness.

name: FatHouse Shaving Oil 1oz Bottle (NEW Smaller Size)
description:
A combination of almond oil, coconut oil,meadowfoam oil and olive oil with essential oils . Use FatHouse Shaving Oil instead of shaving cream or use a dab of oil before lathering up to soften and condition your skin before a shave. FatHouse Shaving Oil gives your razor great glide for a perfect shave. 
Applying FatHouse Shaving Oil:

Wet your face with warm water. Put 4 to 5 drops of shaving oil in your hand and massage it into your face. Be sure to keep your face wet while you shave. If skin becomes dry, add more water by massaging it into the skin. Rinse face with cool water. Pat face dry with clean towel.

You can also use FatHouse Shaving Oil as pre-shave oil underneath shaving creams and gels to help soften your beard and improve the shave. Simply massage 4 to 5 drops into skin and apply shaving product. Do not rinse oil off before applying a shaving cream or gel.

This shaving oil is 100% Natural and uses no fragrance oils.

Shaving Oil has a shelf life of approximately 18 months

Shelf life of Shaving Oil can be prolonged by keeping in a cool, dark place when not using.

Shaving Oil comes in a 1 oz glass bottle.

Each bottle has an orifice reducer to insure the desired amount of product is dispensed.

name: FatHouse Shaving Oil
description:

You can also use FatHouse Shaving Oil as pre-shave oil underneath shaving creams and gels to help soften your beard and improve the shave. Simply massage 4 to 5 drops into skin and apply shaving product. Do not rinse oil off before applying a shaving cream or gel.

name: FatHouse Beard Oil
description:
FatHouse Beard Oil is a perfect combination of oils to moisturize and condition your beard. FatHouse Beard Oil also contains vitamin B and eucalyptus oil, to help keep your beard healthy. Just the perfect amount of fragrance oil is added to give it a crisp clean scent.

Ingredients: Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Meadowfoam Oil, Vitamin E and Fragrance Oil

FatHouse Beard Oil comes in a 1oz bottle glass bottle
Each bottle has an orifice reducer to help dispense  the perfect amount of Beard Oil.

name: FatHouse Beer Soap of the Month Club 6 Month Membership
description:
Receive a different bar of beer soap every month for six months. We have selected some of our favorite beers from regional brewers to create what we hope will be some of your favorite soap!  FatHouse Beer Soap is made by hand in small batches to ensure attention to detail. Our beer soap contains the finest olive, palm and coconut oil, lye and beer.   We add the best essential oils or fragrance oils to give our soaps amazing smells.  All FatHouse Soap Bars are cured for  weeks and  tested to guarantee a mild, excellent bar of soap.
Each bar is approximately 5 oz

Your soap will be shipped by the 15th of the month every month for six months.  
Club membership fee includes shipping costs.


Ingredients: Beer, saponifed olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, fragrance or essential oil

name: FatHouse Bar of Hope
description:
All of the proceeds from the sale of our Bar of Hope go to the fight against breast cancer.
Our Bar of Hope is a fantastic bar of almond milk soap. Scented with a sweet, refreshing fragrance that includes hints of apricot blossom, blue iris and lily of the valley . Almond milk is added to the recipe to create a silky, smooth bar that has wonderful skin conditioning properties.



Ingredients: Water, saponifed olive oil, coconut oil, Shea butter, palm kernel oil, castor oil, almond milk and fragrance oil
 
Saponification is a process that produces soap from fats and lye.
 
Each bar is hand cut and weighs approximately 5oz.
 
We use only the finest ingredients to create the best soaps!
 
Each batch is created using the cold process soap making method.
 
Each soap batch is PH tested and cured for four weeks to ensure mildness.
 
The life of your FatHouse Soap can be prolonged by keeping it in a draining soap dish and away from direct water flow.

name: Pile O Dirt Porter Raspberry Beer Soap
description:
An outstandingly refreshing bar of beer soap.  Olive oil, coconut oil and palm oil combine with Pile O Dirt Porter, a great dark beer brewed in the Black Hills of South Dakota, and an outstanding, crisp raspberry fragrance to create one of our best beer soaps to date.  

Ingredients: saponifed olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil,  fragrance oil

Saponification is a process that produces soap from fats and lye.

Our biggest bar of soap! Each bar is hand cut and weighs approximately 6oz.

Each bar is shipped with a draining wooden soap dish!

We use only the finest ingredients to create the best soaps!

Each batch is created using the cold process soap making method.

Each soap batch is PH tested and cured for four weeks to ensure mildness.

The life of your FatHouse Soap can be prolonged by keeping it in a draining soap dish and away from direct water flow.

name: Citrus Energy Wheat Beer Soap
description:
Citrus Energy Wheat Beer Soap is a combination of Boulevard Unfiltered Wheat Beer and a fragrance we call Citrus Energy.  Citrus Energy is a stimulating blend of scents, including Grapefruit, Lemon and Lime, and orange. Citrus Energy Wheat Beer Soap is a wonderful smelling bar of soap with a thick, moisturizing lather.


Ingredients: Beer, saponifed olive oil, coconut oil, palm oil, fragrance oil

Saponification is a process that produces soap from fats and lye.

Each bar is hand cut and weighs approximately 5oz

We use only the finest ingredients to create the best soaps!

Each batch is created using the cold process soap making method.

Each soap batch is PH tested and cured for four weeks to ensure mildness.


The life of your FatHouse Soap can be prolonged by keeping it in a draining soap dish and away from direct water flow.
